mapper.select: SELECT A.ROW_NUM, A.BOARD_NO, A.BOARD_TITLE, A.BOARD_CONTENT, A.BOARD_HIT, A.IP, A.BOARD_CREATE_DATE, A.GUBUN FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC) AS ROW_NUM, BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_HIT, IP, BOARD_CREATE_DATE, GUBUN FROM BOARD) A WHERE A.ROW_NUM BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}
mapper.insert:
SELECT BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO BOARD (BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_CREATE_DATE, BOARD_HIT, IP) VALUES (#{boardNo}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, SYSDATE, 0, #{ip})
